site_name: Martin's Famous Potato Rolls and Bread
author: Martin's Famous Potato Rolls and Bread
title: Pineapple Upside Down Sticky Buns
instructions:
Preheat oven to 350 F.
Grease a 9” baking dish or pan. (A square springform pan works well.)
Pat slices of pineapple dry between sheets of paper towels.
Arrange pineapple slices evenly in bottom of pan.
Place a cherry in the center of each pineapple ring.
In a medium saucepan over medium heat, melt butter and brown sugar, stirring until sugar is dissolved.
Carefully pour butter mixture over the pineapple and cherries.
Place Sweet Dinner Potato Rolls top-down on the pineapple and cherries.
With a knife, poke holes at the corners of the rolls.
Cover with foil and bake for 8-10 minutes.
Remove from oven and allow to cool for 5 minutes.
Carefully turn the pan upside down onto a serving platter.
Serve and enjoy!
